policy_sections.title: Return Window
policy_sections.content: Customers have 30 days from the delivery date to initiate a return. Returns requested after 30 days may be eligible for store credit at manager discretion.
policy_sections.quick_answer: You have 30 days from delivery to return any product.

policy_sections.title: How to Return a Product
policy_sections.content:
1. Contact customer support via chat, email, or phone to initiate your return.
2. You'll receive a return authorization (RA) number and prepaid shipping label via email within 24 hours.
3. Pack the item securely in its original packaging (not required, but recommended).
4. Attach the prepaid shipping label to the package.
5. Drop off at any USPS location or schedule a pickup.
6. Ship within 14 days of receiving your RA number.
7. Refund will be processed within 5-7 business days of receiving your return.
policy_sections.quick_answer: Contact us to get a return authorization and prepaid label. Ship within 14 days, and your refund will be processed within 5-7 business days.

policy_sections.title: Refund Options
policy_sections.content:
You have two refund options:

Option 1: Refund to Original Payment Method
- Processing time: 5-7 business days after we receive your return
- Funds appear in your account: 3-5 business days after processing (bank dependent)

Option 2: Store Credit for Future Purchase
- Issued immediately upon return receipt
- Includes 10% bonus credit (e.g., $50 return = $55 store credit)
- Never expires
- Can be used on any future purchase
policy_sections.quick_answer: Choose between refund to original payment (5-7 business days) or instant store credit with 10% bonus.

policy_sections.title: Return Conditions
policy_sections.content:
Products must be returned in the following condition:

- Brewers: Must be in working condition with all original accessories (water reservoir, power cord, drip tray)
- Opened pod boxes: Must be at least 50% full (12+ pods remaining in 24-count box)
- Unopened pod boxes: Can be returned in original sealed condition
- Accessories: Must be unused and in original packaging

NOT REQUIRED:
- Original shipping box
- Gift receipt
- Reason for return (but appreciated for product improvement)
policy_sections.quick_answer: Brewers must include all accessories. Opened pod boxes must be at least 50% full. Original packaging not required.

policy_sections.title: No Restocking Fees
policy_sections.content: We never charge restocking fees. All returns are completely free - we provide prepaid shipping labels for all returns within the US.
policy_sections.quick_answer: No restocking fees ever. We provide free prepaid return shipping.

policy_sections.title: Return Policy Exceptions
policy_sections.content:
The following items cannot be returned:

- Gift cards (non-refundable)
- Final sale items (clearly marked on product page with 'Final Sale' badge)
- Products returned after 60 days (except warranty claims)
- Items damaged due to misuse or neglect (warranty may still apply)

Note: If you receive a defective or damaged product, different terms apply - see Warranty & Defects section.
policy_sections.quick_answer: Gift cards and final sale items cannot be returned. All other products are returnable within 30 days.

policy_sections.title: International Returns (Canada & Mexico)
policy_sections.content:
Returns from Canada and Mexico:
- Must contact support for return instructions (different process than US)
- Customer responsible for return shipping costs
- Customs/duties fees are non-refundable
- Processing time: 10-14 business days after receipt
- Store credit option recommended to avoid international transfer fees
policy_sections.quick_answer: International customers must contact support for return instructions. Return shipping costs and customs fees are customer's responsibility.

policy_sections.title: Damaged or Defective Products
policy_sections.content:
If you receive a damaged or defective product:

1. Contact us immediately (within 7 days of delivery for shipping damage)
2. Provide photos of the damage if possible
3. We'll send a replacement immediately at no cost
4. No need to return the damaged item unless requested
5. Brewer defects covered under 2-year warranty

This is separate from our standard return policy and has different terms.
policy_sections.quick_answer: Contact us immediately if your product arrives damaged or defective. We'll send a replacement at no cost.

policy_sections.title: Auto-Delivery Subscription Cancellations
policy_sections.content:
Auto-delivery subscriptions can be cancelled anytime with no penalties:

- Cancel online in your account dashboard
- Or contact customer support
- If order hasn't shipped yet: cancellation is immediate
- If order has shipped: cancellation applies to next delivery
- You can pause (skip deliveries) instead of cancelling

Cancelled subscriptions lose the 10% auto-delivery discount.
policy_sections.quick_answer: Cancel your auto-delivery subscription anytime with no penalties. Manage it in your account dashboard or contact us.

common_scenarios.condition: Purchase amount < $50 AND within 30 days AND no abuse pattern
common_scenarios.action: Immediately provide return authorization and prepaid label

common_scenarios.condition: Purchase amount >= $50 OR outside 30 days OR abuse pattern detected
common_scenarios.action: Escalate to human agent for review

common_scenarios.condition: Brewer purchased within 2 years AND defect reported
common_scenarios.action: Escalate to quality control team immediately

common_scenarios.condition: Product arrived damaged, reported within 7 days
common_scenarios.action: Escalate to support team for immediate replacement
